product_name: The North Face Light Zip-T Neck Top - Women's
long_description: Featuring a comfort-enhancing front zipper, The North Face Light Zip-T neck top for women helps keep you warm during adventures in cool weather. Moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams which are designed to enhance motion. Quarter-length zipper ventilates instantly. The North Face Light Zip-T neck top offers a relaxed next-to-skin fit that skims the body.
short_description: Featuring a comfort-enhancing front zipper, The North Face Light Zip-T neck top for women helps keep you warm during adventures in cool weather.
